Reviews.Title: Great product, extraordinary battery life
Reviews.Author: Keith Lightfoot
Reviews.Content: Extremely pleased with the product.Aluminium case makes it feel solid in your hand, size still allows for one-hand operation and fits easily into your pocket.Screen quality is excellent, colours are sharp, graphics are quick, no lag on screen swipes or task switching.Battery life has exceeded my expectations. All the reviews talked about the Sony SP having a long battery life (using their standard bench tests), but in real life the unit often runs for 3-5 days without charging (Note: I am not a heavy phone user ... a typical day would include ... reading and replying to emails, answering a couple of calls, taking a few photos, catching up with Facebook friends and sending a couple of text messages).I downloaded a high resolution graphics game to test the battery life and the processor speed ... the unit performed flawlessly with no game stutter or delays and not surprisingly the battery life fell away significantly during game play.The camera is listed as 8.0MP but lacks clarity on occasions and is definitely not as consistent as the 8.0MP camera in the old Xperia X10A, which is a little confusing given Sony's camera expertise. There is talk on the internet about Sony releasing a software upgrade for the camera, let's hope it comes to pass.Sound is terrific, both from a music listening perspective and from a telephone call perspective.

Reviews.Title: powerful smart device!
Reviews.Author: Brunello
Reviews.Content: Eeasy powerful smart! It works fine offering many functions that make it precious in several circumstances. Buy it and you'll be satisfied!

Reviews.Title: disappointing after the update
Reviews.Author: bram
Reviews.Content: Was a very good phone, fast, reliable, good looking, very sharp good screen.However after the new Sony upgrade I have had nothing but trouble.The phone works very slow, everything takes forever, the phone freezes sometimes. Alot of the time you have to press the 'on' button 3 times until the screen lights up,...All these minor and major glitches together make me an unsatisfied customer.So if you buy it, don't do the upgrade and you'll be fine.

Reviews.Title: it's perfect to me!
Reviews.Author: allisson
Reviews.Content: the product complies with all what he promised, extremely fast ,wonderful resolution, and with this processor runs all the games that have heavier without catching any! i love it!

Reviews.Title: wrong item
Reviews.Author: kerem
Reviews.Content: ı purchased sp c5303 but they sent me c5302....5302 does not support lte and it is cheaper than sp5303 and5306 but they charged me same money with 5303...now ı use the phone there is no problem ı am glad but ı would prefer to use 5303 because in my country  people use 5303

Reviews.Title: The phone is Awsome
Reviews.Author: Sviatoslav
Reviews.Content: When i was looking for a new phone i was thinking about getting some old Xperia phone from 2009 or 2010 cause that was the option when i bought my Sone Ericsson Satio 2 years ago. I though that its time to move on so i went to sony and i researched what where the new phones they released, i was amazed on how many pphones there where. I dont know why but i liked the SP phone better, when i found out that the price for it is only 270 i bought it right away i also bout a book flip case, and a SD card for 32GB and it all together costed me 300 buck, so thats nice. Now lets get to a phone, unlike the most people i understand that phone isnt a PS3 or a PSP and its not ment for gaming no matter how good it is, i never play games, (when i played games on a phone last time it was when i was 13 in Belarus and we all had Cimense C65) i only read books, and sometimes watching videos cause i have an MP3 player for a music. Battary life- set up to a stamina mode, it says that i can live about 4 days and 8 hours in a standby, ive charged my phone about 3 years ago, i used texting, calling, red a book couple of times and i still got 75% AMAZING because with stamina mode it only kills 1% of battary during the night. The screen- the screen is really good, i like all the details about it. Performance is good too its not lagging and it fast, sometimes might freeze the internet cause my wi-fe is bad. Overall look of the phone is very good, i liked that little plastic bar at the bottom that glows with different colors no matter what you do is it music, photos, sms, or calling. The phone is great and id recommend to buy it.

Reviews.Title: it doesn't work 3G, 4G or LTE with Tmobile
Reviews.Author: TUONG LY
Reviews.Content: I read very carefully the comments of this phone before deciding to buy this phone. But after I use it for a week, i find that my provider is Tmobile so I can't use 3G or 4G on this phone. I only receive 2G signal from T Mobile and 3G from AT&T.; Beside that, the price phone go down very fast after 1 week so finally I return this phone to seller.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone but can be better...
Reviews.Author: Odile M.
Reviews.Content: When I bought the Xperia SP, I spent a lot of time on the net (especially on [...]) searching for the pros and the cons about this phone.At first sight, it was the perfect phone for me: very nice phone and the design is OMG! It's not too heavy and it's the right size for me (XPeria Z is too large with its 5"). I like the "light effect" at the bottom while receiving a call, charging, listening to music or watching pictures. .But while using it, it was all different. It discharges faster, even if nothing is running.Worst, it's freezing all the time. Sometimes it even reboot itself because the apps running are too busy and I can't do nothing than letting it work by itself.I think Sony can do better.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone on Great Time
Reviews.Author: Zantetsukensv
Reviews.Content: hii just want to say that i required a very good android phone that can be able to use in 3G and LTE 4G network in future in El Salvador.i am trully happy with this, maybe i prefer and recomend not to update the phone until the KitKat version is available, the 4.3 is kind of unstable but is running acceptable.i recomend the phone due to is coming ready to use with any other carrier.Regards.

Reviews.Title: Two words. totally satisfied
Reviews.Author: Aderson Barreto
Reviews.Content: The smarthphone work very well. zero problems with Android. The pictures are excellent quality, and is in my limit with respect to the size. beautiful smartphone. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, could use a better description specifying which providers the phone was built for
Reviews.Author: Peter A. Crow "Peter"
Reviews.Content: The phone performs beautifully for the price. I highly recommend Sony phones, far better designed and manufactured than Motorola or Samsung. However, I give it only a 4 star because as a first time customer in buying an unlocked phone separately, none of the other reviews or description informed me that this is the worldwide version. It will work in the US, but only with at&t; networks if you want decent data speeds. I didn't realize that the sp comes in three different models that differ only in network compatibility. This phone is perfect if you are traveling abroad, but do your research before you buy it. One of the other 2 would be better for using strictly stateside. This phone does not accommodate the 1900 or 1700 spectrum for either 3g or 4g. The network markets are changing but not fast enough to work with most of the signals this phone is capable of, most of which are completely useless in the states.

Reviews.Title: Good One
Reviews.Author: siaw kwabena
Reviews.Content: i like it is really nice phone i would say that if you want phone to use this is good phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, even though pretty heavy
Reviews.Author: AndreaMelzo
Reviews.Content: Been using the phone for few days, I have to say it performs really well. 4.6" is the perfect screen for me and I love the notification light.Just one flaw, it is pretty heavy

Reviews.Title: Good and durable
Reviews.Author: jhuarniz
Reviews.Content: It works fine, run games very smoothly the front camera it's horrible. sometimes it freeze and restart itself. Bottom light could be over brightly.

Reviews.Title: What I expected!
Reviews.Author: Vasconcelos
Reviews.Content: Very good. Exactly what I expected when decided to buy it. Excellent camera. Great pictures. Battery works good, especially on Stamina mode. It has a small size with great funcionality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Parreira Lima Cunha
Reviews.Content: Great phone! It gives me a 1,5 day of battery. Elevated cost X benefit. You can take great pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: Sony Xperia SP
Reviews.Author: Eddy
Reviews.Content: It feels good to be a cut above the other android owners. Great phone....I just cant put it down. Great work Sony :)

Reviews.Title: my phone
Reviews.Author: Kouassi Tanoh
Reviews.Content: I like my phone It's really useful.it's rare and unique in its kind.so great for me actually .

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: Victor Vilanova
Reviews.Content: Very nice device.Beautiful design, nice build.For me it is the best benefit x price.I am very happy to own this phone.
